message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, we believe its true value lies well beyond $15000. Considering its unique benefits and market positioning, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for this product at $18000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-value asset at a premium rate, tailored specifically for discerning clients like yourself. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product.
